original_text: and give you into the hand of those who seek your life, into the hand of those of whom you are afraid, even into the hand of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon and into the hand of the Chaldeans.
korean_text: 네 생명을 찾는 자의 손과 네가 두려워하는 자의 손 곧 바벨론의 왕 느부갓네살의 손과 갈대아인의 손에 줄 것이라

sentences.original_text: and give you into the hand of those who seek your life
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 생명을 찾는 자들의 손에 너를 넘겨주리라

sentences.original_text: into the hand of those of whom you are afraid
even into the hand of Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon
and into the hand of the Chaldeans.
